UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Cupiennin 1a exhibits a remarkably broad, non-stereospecific cytolytic activity on bacteria, protozoan parasites, insects, and human cancer cells.
Literature.Author: Kuhn-Nentwig L, Willems J, Seebeck T, Shalaby T, Kaiser M, Nentwig W

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(IC50=0.375µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(IC50=0.119µM),Trypanosoma brucei brucei MiTat1.2(221)(IC50=0.136µM),Trypanosoma brucei brucei MiTat1.2(221)(MIC=0.328µM),Drosophila melanogaster(LD50=2.9nmol/g)
